featureList.home.message: Analyse and improve your code quality.

featureList.code.description: Flutterando Metrics checks anti-patterns and reports code metrics to help you monitor the quality of your code and improve it.

featureList.code.description.message: Flutterando Metrics checks anti-patterns and reports code metrics to help you monitor the quality of your code and improve it.

featureList.cicd.description: A inicialização por meio da linha de comando permite que você integre facilmente o Dart Code Metrics ao processo de CI/CD e obtenha resultados no console, HTML, JSON, CodeClimate ou GitHub.

featureList.cicd.description.message: Launching from the command line allows you to easily integrate Dart Code Metrics into your CI/CD process and get results in the console, HTML, JSON, CodeClimate, or GitHub.

featureList.community.description.message: Flutterando Metrics is developed community by community.
